overview.title: Solo Adventure Trip to India
overview.about: A cultural and adventurous journey to explore the vibrant and rich cultural heritage of India over 5 days for a young traveler.
overview.clothing: Light, breathable clothing; hats and sunglasses for sun protection; comfortable walking shoes

Morning.flight: Departure from Tel Aviv to New Delhi

attractions.name: Check-in at Hotel
attractions.detail: Relax after the flight and settle in
attractions.address: Exact hotel address in New Delhi

attractions.name: The Red Fort
attractions.detail: A historic fort which served as the main residence of the Mughal emperors.
attractions.address: Netaji Subhash Marg, Lal Qila, Chandni Chowk, New Delhi, Delhi, 110006, India
attractions.amenities: Guided tours, Audio guides, Gift shop

restaurant.name: Karim's
restaurant.address: Jama Masjid, Gali Kababian, Old Delhi, New Delhi, 110006, India

attractions.name: India Gate
attractions.detail: A war memorial located astride the Rajpath, on the eastern edge of the ceremonial axis of New Delhi.
attractions.address: Rajpath, India Gate, New Delhi, Delhi, 110001, India

restaurant.name: Andhra Bhavan
restaurant.address: 1, Ashoka Road, Feroze Shah Road, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India

attractions.name: Lotus Temple
attractions.detail: Known for its flowerlike shape, it is a Bahá'í House of Worship and also a prominent attraction in Delhi.
attractions.address: Lotus Temple Rd, Bahapur, Shambhu Dayal Bagh, Kalkaji, New Delhi, Delhi 110019, India

restaurant.name: Saravana Bhavan
restaurant.address: P-13, Connaught Circus, Connaught Lane, Barakhamba, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India

attractions.name: Qutub Minar
attractions.detail: A UNESCO World Heritage Site located in the Mehrauli area of Delhi, it is the tallest minaret in the world made up of bricks.
attractions.address: Qutub Minar, Mehrauli, New Delhi, Delhi 110030, India

restaurant.name: Olive Bar & Kitchen
restaurant.address: One Style Mile, Haveli 6, Kalka Das Marg, Mehrauli, New Delhi, Delhi 110030, India

attractions.name: Akshardham Temple
attractions.detail: A Hindu temple and a spiritual-cultural campus in Delhi. Reflecting traditional Hindu and Indian culture.
attractions.address: Noida Mor, Pandav Nagar, New Delhi, Delhi 110092, India

restaurant.name: Punjab Grill
restaurant.address: R3, Lower Ground Floor, Saket, New Delhi, Delhi 110017, India

attractions.name: Hauz Khas Village
attractions.detail: A trendy neighborhood known for its nightlife. The area offers an eclectic mix of cafes, boutiques, art galleries, and restaurants.
attractions.address: Hauz Khas, New Delhi, Delhi, India

restaurant.name: Naivedyam
restaurant.address: 1, Hauz Khas Village, Deer Park, Hauz Khas, New Delhi, Delhi 110016, India

attractions.name: Humayun's Tomb
attractions.detail: A magnificent structure of Persian architecture built as a tomb of the Mughal Emperor Humayun.
attractions.address: Mathura Road Opposite, Hazrat Nizamuddin Aulia Dargah, Nizamuddin, New Delhi, Delhi 110013, India

restaurant.name: Saravana Bhavan
restaurant.address: Select Citywalk, Ground Floor, Select Citywalk Mall, Saket, New Delhi, Delhi 110017, India

attractions.name: Jama Masjid
attractions.detail: One of the largest mosques in India, built by Shah Jahan and a stunning example of Mughal architecture.
attractions.address: Jama Masjid Rd, Jama Masjid, Chandni Chowk, New Delhi, Delhi 110006, India
attractions.amenities: Tourist-friendly, Photography allowed outside main prayer area

restaurant.name: Paranthe Wali Gali
restaurant.address: Chandni Chowk, New Delhi, Delhi, India

attractions.name: Chandni Chowk
attractions.detail: One of the oldest and busiest markets in Old Delhi. Known for spices, dried fruit, silver jewelry, and vivid saris.
attractions.address: Chandni Chowk, New Delhi, Delhi, India

restaurant.name: Al Jawahar
restaurant.address: 8, Jama Masjid Matia Mahal Road, Matia Mahal, Opposite Gate No. 1, Jama Masjid, New Delhi, Delhi 110006, India

attractions.name: Pack and Check-out
attractions.detail: Prepare for departure back to Israel.

Noon.flight: Departure from New Delhi to Tel Aviv

transport_options.mode: Arrival in Tel Aviv, Taxi home

accommodations.name: Hotel Connaught Royale
accommodations.address: 106, Babar Rd, Block M, Connaught Place, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India
accommodations.reviews: 3.5 to 4-star ratings, praised for cleanliness and location

plan.additional_recommendations: Ensure to try local street food for an authentic experience but always prioritize hygiene. Visit local markets for unique souvenirs.
plan.essential_apps: Google Maps for navigation, Ola/Uber for transportation, Zomato for restaurant reviews and bookings, XE Currency for currency conversion
plan.summary: A culturally rich exploration of India's capital, New Delhi, featuring visits to historic sites, bustling markets and sampling a swath of local cuisines. Ideal for young travelers looking to gain a profound insight into India's heritage and daily life within a modest budget.
